text:
@PressSec Since Herman backed Trump, it is plain
That he lacked any functioning brain.
He entered Trump's crowd
With no facemask allowed
So the Devil is now raising Cain.

#HermanCain #TrumpKilledHermanCain  
#COVIDIOT #SixFeetDeepState #coronavirus #limericks
